alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:11PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pima County through 500 PM MST... At 410 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms 18 miles south of Pisinemo, or 28 miles west of Sells, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ali Chugk, Vamori, Cowlic, Pia Oik, Kots Kug, Itak and Papago Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
